title: Wrong email
body: Dear riot, I made a new account for lol. I accidentally typed in my email wrong, I rolled with it because I thought it wouldn't be a big issue. But the accepted email is non existing. I would like to find a way to change it to my existing email. I would be happy to answer any security questions I have to answer

replies.body: Out account specialists should be able to get that taken care of pretty easily! Fill out our [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and do you best to answer the questions they ask. Once you're verified, let us know that you don't have access to that email (we all make mistakes)  and they should be able to update that.
Thank you so much for the help sir. But the only problem is when I put the date I made the account, I put it "-----------------" it says invalid date, sorry Iam working you out

No worries, just be sure to answer the questions as best you can! If that date doesn't seem to work when filling out the form, just put something else for now and you can clear up the confusion once they respond to your ticket ^_^.

Also, friendly tip, try not to disclose any of your personal account information here on the boards as others could potentially see it and use that to get into your account!!

AHHH yes, that was very dumb of me. But if someone decides to try they will have a lvl 4 account in their hands xd.
Edit: Thanks for all the help again, sir!
Since the email I accidentally put in is non existing, I can't view my tickets :(. Because I need to have my email verified
